snippet: Two-time Wimbledon tennis champion Petra Kvitova said on Tuesday she had been "badly injured" on her left playing hand after being attacked by a knife-wielding intruder in her apartment and would need to see specialists about the injury....
lead_paragraph: Two-time Wimbledon tennis champion Petra Kvitova said on Tuesday she had been "badly injured" on her left playing hand after being attacked by a knife-wielding intruder in her apartment and would need to see specialists about the injury.

headline.main: Tennis Champion Kvitova 'Badly Injured' on Playing Hand, to See Specialists
headline.print_headline: Tennis Champion Kvitova 'Badly Injured' on Playing Hand, to See Specialists
